TestCaseTitle: Invalid Date format for a date field "ReinsuranceEffectiveDate" (External API)
TestDescription:
As a zurich underwriter, if I try to create a new work item using the API and there is an error, I would like to see a message stating:

If the currency is null; "Currency field is mandatory."
2) If the reinsurance effective date is null; "Reinsurance Effective Date is mandatory."

3) If lineOfBusiness is null "Line of Business is mandatory."

4) If apiEnabledFlag is not enabled in the toolkit - "Error - Contact FAConnect@aon.com for assistance."

5) If the date format of ReinsuranceEffectiveDate is not correct - "Reinsurance Effective Date is not in proper format."

6) If a contract is not available "The currency, effective date and line of business do not match an active contract. Contact FAConnect@aon.com for assistance."

7) If the contract section on currency is not correct "The currency, effective date and line of business do not match an active contract. Contact FAConnect@aon.com for assistance."

8) If the line of business is not correct "The currency, effective date and line of business do not match an active contract. Contact FAConnect@aon.com for assistance."

9) If the user is not assigned to the contract "You are not assigned to this contract.  Please contact FAConnect@aon.com for assistance."
TestObjective: Show meaningful messages when data does not match a contract
TestSteps:
Pre-Condition: Postman should be installed in system and have collection to run.
Pre-Condition: User has received Bearer token to authenticate.
Pre-Condition: Definition has been enabled for API Acceptance In UI.
Pre-Condition: JSON message has been defined and contains fields relevant to the Contract Section / Definition .
Pre-Condition: Test User should have access to contract.
Launch Postman.
Select Import option 
Drop the collection or import from your local.
Open the collection.
Navigate to Headers 
Check the Authorization ,Grids-Authorization ,X-Correlation-ID ,Content-Type,IsrequestedfromReferenceapp and username
Enter Bearer Token with bearer "Token" in Authorization
and Enter Test Username in Username.
Enter X-correlation-ID as 42654345_ytruty_76587657.
Enter IsrequestedfromReferenceapp as False.
Enter URL for Sending POST request 
Navigate to Body and Provide the JSON  with the below test data

"error": {

    "message": "30-08-2018 is an invalid format for Reinsurance Expiration Date",
